submission:
class Solution:
    def countOfPairs(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        lastArr = None
        lastPrefixSums = None
        dp1 = [None] * n
        dp2 = [None] * n
        sum = lambda arr,a,b: arr[b] - (arr[a-1] if a-1 >= 0 else 0) if a <= b else 0
        add =lambda arr,ele: arr.append(arr[-1] + ele) if arr else arr.append(ele)
        ans =0
        for i in range(n-1, -1, -1):
            a = nums[i]
            arr = []
            prefixSums = []
            for x in range(a+1):
                y = a-x
                if i == n-1:
                    arr.append(1)
                    add(prefixSums, 1)
                else:
                    one = 0 if x > nums[i+1] else sum(lastPrefixSums, x + max(0, (nums[i+1]-x-y)), nums[i+1])
                   # print(x, y, x+(nums[i+1]-x-y), one)

                    arr.append(one)
                    add(prefixSums, one)

            lastArr = arr
            lastPrefixSums = prefixSums
           # print(i, nums[i], arr, prefixSums)
        mod = 1000000007
        for a in lastArr:
            ans = (ans % mod + a % mod) % mod
        return ans
